content: {'id': 'c72e5ea6-b9eb-306d-8d35-88c575580acb', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': 'Jaguar Land Rover hack cost UK economy $2.5 billion, report says', 'description': '', 'summary': "By James Pearson LONDON (Reuters) -The August hack of Jaguar Land Rover (JLR), owned by India's Tata Motors, cost the British economy 1.9 billion pounds ($2.55 billion) and affected over 5,000", 'pubDate': '2025-10-22T06:05:34Z', 'displayTime': '2025-10-22T06:05:34Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/b5c608dd20f02318b7fb7d17b257e2bf', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 507, 'caption': '', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/Cgexp3vrqrTIcjYlMpwvhw--~B/aD01MDc7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/b5c608dd20f02318b7fb7d17b257e2bf', 'width': 800, 'height': 507, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/yMQCZpb7tsfJHG6Lf9HRRA--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters.com/b5c608dd20f02318b7fb7d17b257e2bf', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'https://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/jaguar-land-rover-hack-cost-060534996.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/jaguar-land-rover-hack-cost-060534996.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': '34a5d2ef-12bb-3fd2-9b9d-9d4b3ecc092d', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': 'Jaguar Land Rover hack cost UK economy an estimated $2.5 billion, report says', 'description': '', 'summary': 'LONDON (Reuters) -The hack of Jaguar Land Rover, owned by India\'s Tata Motors, cost the British economy an estimated 1.9 billion pounds ($2.55 billion) and affected over 5,000 organisations, an independent cybersecurity body said in a report published on Wednesday.  The report was produced by the Cyber Monitoring Centre, an independent, not for profit organisation made up of industry specialists, including the former head of Britain\'s National Cyber Security Centre.  "This incident appears to be the most economically damaging cyber event to hit the UK, with the vast majority of the financial impact being due to the loss of manufacturing output at JLR and its suppliers," the report said.', 'pubDate': '2025-10-22T06:02:24Z', 'displayTime': '2025-10-22T06:02:24Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/fdc49f5a370b7aefa0e46dd1181fc2af', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 554, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: A member of staff works on the production line at Jaguar Land Rover’s factory in Solihull', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/bFKkW9wDFOvFcEY0dVE9oQ--~B/aD01NTQ7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/fdc49f5a370b7aefa0e46dd1181fc2af', 'width': 800, 'height': 554, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/0SbhYk..twRMM054OSMQZA--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/fdc49f5a370b7aefa0e46dd1181fc2af', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'http://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/jaguar-land-rover-hack-cost-060224865.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/jaguar-land-rover-hack-cost-060224865.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

content: {'id': 'd6e07bf2-39bd-3254-9ea2-53b9d596390d', 'contentType': 'STORY', 'title': "UK's Vertu Motors sees up to $7.4 million hit from JLR cyberattack", 'description': '', 'summary': "Luxury carmaker JLR, owned\xa0by India's Tata Motors said on Tuesday that it was restarting some of its operations after it was forced into a near six-week shutdown following a major cybersecurity incident.  Vertu, which operates 10 JLR dealerships, said about 2 million pounds of the profit impact was in September, with the full-year effect hinging on when JLR restores its systems.  The company said it expects to report annual adjusted pretax profit in line with market expectations, excluding the JLR impact.", 'pubDate': '2025-10-08T07:24:06Z', 'displayTime': '2025-10-08T07:24:06Z', 'isHosted': True, 'bypassModal': False, 'previewUrl': None, 'thumbnail': {'originalUrl': 'https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/5b3c7fa4e1b3a0867e2ccbd096b6efe1', 'originalWidth': 800, 'originalHeight': 534, 'caption': 'FILE PHOTO: A member of staff works on the production line at Jaguar Land Rover’s factory in Solihull', 'resolutions': [{'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/kwaEXwB6UzwjkP26DTpRCA--~B/aD01MzQ7dz04MDA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/5b3c7fa4e1b3a0867e2ccbd096b6efe1', 'width': 800, 'height': 534, 'tag': 'original'}, {'url': 'https://s.yimg.com/uu/api/res/1.2/Ym4C_Phb0tYz_INfss17Dg--~B/Zmk9c3RyaW07aD0xMjg7dz0xNzA7YXBwaWQ9eXRhY2h5b24-/https://media.zenfs.com/en/reuters-finance.com/5b3c7fa4e1b3a0867e2ccbd096b6efe1', 'width': 170, 'height': 128, 'tag': '170x128'}]}, 'provider': {'displayName': 'Reuters', 'url': 'http://www.reuters.com/'}, 'canonicalUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/uks-vertu-motors-sees-7-072406986.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'clickThroughUrl': {'url': 'https://finance.yahoo.com/news/uks-vertu-motors-sees-7-072406986.html', 'site': 'finance', 'region': 'US', 'lang': 'en-US'}, 'metadata': {'editorsPick': False}, 'finance': {'premiumFinance': {'isPremiumNews': False, 'isPremiumFreeNews': False}}, 'storyline': None}

{'id': '2caa2431-11ba-3a83-ad69-12e211c96e1f', 'contentType': 'VIDEO', 'title': "UK's Jaguar Land Rover to restart some manufacturing after shutdown", 'description': "<body><p>STORY: Jaguar Land Rover said Tuesday some factories would restart manufacturing on Wednesday.</p><p>It comes after a near six week shutdown at Britain's biggest carmaker following a cyber attack.</p><p>JLR also said it would provide smaller parts suppliers with up-front cash during the production restart phase.</p><p>The luxury carmaker is owned by India's Tata Motors and has three factories in Britain.</p><p>Together they produce about 1,000 cars per day.</p><p>Economists had warned of the impact of a prolonged shutdown on the country's manufacturing output.\xa0</p><p>JLR said its engines and battery units would restart work on Wednesday, as well as parts of its vehicle production plant.</p><p>That would mean the return to work of some of its 33,000 staff after weeks at home.\xa0</p><p>The company added production lines for the Range Rover and Range Rover Sport vehicles at its main factory in Solihull are due to start later this week.</p></body>", 'summary': "

STORY: Jaguar Land Rover said Tuesday some factories would restart manufacturing on Wednesday.

It comes after a near six week shutdown at Britain's biggest carmaker following a cyber attack.

JLR also said it would provide smaller parts suppliers with up-front cash during the production restart phase.

The luxury carmaker is owned by India's Tata Motors and has three factories in Britain.

Together they produce about 1,000 cars per day.

Economists had warned of the impact of a prolonged shutdown on the country's manufacturing output. 

JLR said its engines and battery units would restart work on Wednesday, as well as parts of its vehicle production plant.

That would mean the return to work of some of its 33,000 staff after weeks at home. 

The company added production lines for the Range Rover and Range Rover Sport vehicles at its main factory in Solihull are due to start later this week.

{'id': 'db2f8a46-ff43-349b-98d4-c62533b6e3b6', 'contentType': 'VIDEO', 'title': "Tata Motor's JLR begins phased manufacturing restart post cyber attack", 'description': '

STORY: :: JLR

Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) said Monday it will soon resume some of its manufacturing following a cyber attack earlier this month. \xa0

:: File

The luxury carmaker, owned by Tata Motors, has lost $68 million a week during this production shutdown, the BBC said.\xa0

This phased recovery was announced a day after Britain said it would back JLR with a $2 billion loan guarantee to help support its supply chain.

JLR has already struggled this year, reporting a near 11% quarterly sales drop in July.

That was partly due to a temporary halt in shipments to the U.S. after the Trump administration slapped tariffs on car imports.

:: JLR

The carmaker also slashed its fiscal 2026 profit margin target as uncertainty around these tariff policies continued.

The company has three factories in Britain that manufacture a total of about 1,000 cars per day.\xa0

During the shutdown, many of its 33,000 staff were told to stay at home.

Last week, JLR said it informed suppliers that some systems were online.

This included the financial system that controls the wholesale of vehicles.

:: JLR

The breach was the latest in a string of cyber and ransomware attacks targeting companies around the world.\xa0

In Britain, household names including Marks & Spencer and the Co-op Group have fallen victim to increasingly sophisticated breaches.
